images.copyright: Backcountry adventurer Alex Peterson speed riding on the south side of Mount Hood, Oregon, USA (© Richard Hallman/DEEPOL by plainpicture)
images.title: Ready, Set, Snow
images.caption: Ready, Set, Snow
images.desc: Far above the clouds, an adrenaline-seeking skier glides past the jagged Crater Rock on Oregon's Mount Hood (western USA). He's practicing a relatively young sport known as speed riding—similar to paragliding but with more emphasis on high velocity than altitude. Skiers with parachute-like 'wings' launch downslope at high speed, navigating runs partly on skis and partly in the air.

tooltips.walls: இந்த படத்தை பதிவிறக்கவும். வால்பேப்பருக்கு மட்டுமே பயன்படுத்த இந்தப் படம் கட்டுப்படுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளது.
